name: naturezen
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nature zen
des:
This skill gives a quote full of wisdom from Buddha, Gandhi, Confucius, Lao-Tzu, etc. It displays on the screen the photo of a magnificent landscape as well as the quote.
In the case of an echo spot, only the photo will appear on the screen.

You will have the option to ask to repeat, go to the next picture and quote, or stop at any time.

This skill contains more than 45 quotes and more than 70 photos.

A similar skill with photos of young women is in preparation.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
